.NET Framework 3.5.name: VRTK_AxisScaleGrabAction
.NET Framework 3.5.summary: The Axis Scale Grab Action provides a mechanism to scale objects when they are grabbed with a secondary controller.
.NET Framework 3.5.example: VRTK/Examples/043_Controller_SecondaryControllerActions demonstrates the ability to grab an object with one controller and scale it by grabbing and pulling with the second controller.

methods.name: CalculateAxisScale(float centerPosition, float initialPosition, float currentPosition)
methods.syntax: protected virtual float CalculateAxisScale(float centerPosition, float initialPosition, float currentPosition)
methods.linkedSyntax: protected virtual float CalculateAxisScale(float centerPosition, float initialPosition, float currentPosition)

methods.name: Initialise(VRTK_InteractableObject currentGrabbdObject, VRTK_InteractGrab currentPrimaryGrabbingObject, VRTK_InteractGrab currentSecondaryGrabbingObject, Transform primaryGrabPoint, Transform secondaryGrabPoint)
methods.summary: The Initalise method is used to set up the state of the secondary action when the object is initially grabbed by a secondary controller.

params.value: The Interactable Object script for the object currently being grabbed by the primary controller.
The Interact Grab script for the object that is associated with the primary controller.
The Interact Grab script for the object that is associated with the secondary controller.
The point on the object where the primary controller initially grabbed the object.
The point on the object where the secondary controller initially grabbed the object.

methods.syntax: public void Initialise(VRTK_InteractableObject currentGrabbdObject, VRTK_InteractGrab currentPrimaryGrabbingObject, VRTK_InteractGrab currentSecondaryGrabbingObject, Transform primaryGrabPoint, Transform secondaryGrabPoint)
methods.linkedSyntax: public void Initialise([VRTK_InteractableObject](#/type/VRTK.VRTK_InteractableObject/index) currentGrabbdObject, [VRTK_InteractGrab](#/type/VRTK.VRTK_InteractGrab/index) currentPrimaryGrabbingObject, [VRTK_InteractGrab](#/type/VRTK.VRTK_InteractGrab/index) currentSecondaryGrabbingObject, Transform primaryGrabPoint, Transform secondaryGrabPoint)

methods.name: ProcessFixedUpdate()
methods.summary: The ProcessFixedUpdate method runs in every FixedUpdate on the Interactable Object whilst it is being grabbed by a secondary controller and performs the scaling action.

methods.name: ProcessUpdate()
methods.summary: The ProcessUpdate method runs in every Update on the Interactable Object whilst it is being grabbed by a secondary controller.
